title: [U: Now available] Google TV gets another streaming stick, the Mecool KD3 w/ 8GB storage
content:
Google TV has shown up on a lot of full-size TVs, but very few streaming sticks and boxes. This week, little-known Android TV partner Mecool has announced its first Google TV streaming stick in the KD3, but it has the same unfortunate Achilles’ heel as Google’s device.

more…

The post [U: Now available] Google TV gets another streaming stick, the Mecool KD3 w/ 8GB storage appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Longtime Android TV partner, Mecool, has just announced its first Google TV streaming device in the Mecool KD3 stick.
